reviewText:
The Amazon listing for this is skimpy and didn't say what media were used. I didn't scan to see that 'Airbrush studio' produced it.

I was looking for general portrait drawing or painting technique. This DVD wasn't a great help for me for either of those.

However if you are into airbrushing it seems to cover a lot of what you may want. It is completely focused on airbrushing.
